function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Use of thermal face scans and ai-enabled cameras for temperature screening","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of ai-enabled medical imaging for covid-19 diagnosis","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of unbiased data affecting ai model performance","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential contamination of medical equipment during use of medical imaging techniques","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Development of ai-created drugs without comprehensive understanding of potential side effects","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delayed availability of treatments due to extensive scientific checks and clinical trials","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges with ai models due to lack of historical data and noisy data","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy concerns associated with the use of ai for crowd surveillance, leading to fear and distrust among the public","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate testing data may lead to incorrect understanding of the disease spread.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Tampering with patient details can lead to misinformation and incorrect treatment.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Recording covid-19 patient details on blockchain-based platforms","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Supply chain disruptions due to covid-19 and trade restrictions","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Technical challenges in scalability of blockchain-based platforms","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on 5g technology for real-time telemedicine consultations may lead to connectivity issues and disruptions in patient care","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contagious diseases may spread through the use of telemedicine platforms, such as the 5g+ teleconsultation and diagnosis platforms mentioned.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential transmission of infectious diseases through shared medical imaging devices","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate temperature monitoring leading to failure to detect potential covid-19 cases","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for cross-contamination through shared use of 5g-powered robots","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Deployment of 5g robots in high-traffic areas","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Wearable iot devices for patient monitoring","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential risk of false readings from the infrared thermometers leading to incorrect assessment of body temperatures.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of infrastructure to support 5g networks","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective use of 5g networks in healthcare without other technologies","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of sars-cov-2 through respiratory droplets and infectious aerosols","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Asymptomatic individuals spreading the virus","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Widespread contagious disease transmission","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid spread from animals to humans","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate readings from wearable sensors may lead to misdiagnosis or delayed diagnosis of diseases.","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Wearable devices and unobtrusive sensing technologies may not accurately monitor early symptoms of covid-19 or common health conditions, leading to misdiagnosis or delayed treatment.","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on wearables for remote assessment of covid-19 patients may overlook other critical symptoms or conditions that require in-person evaluation.","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy and security risks associated with the transmission and storage of sensitive health data from wearables to cloud-based platforms.","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited availability of multimodal sensing systems for covid-19 symptoms hinders comprehensive disease monitoring and prevention.","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sharing of temperature data with mobile app via bluetooth can lead to unauthorized access of sensitive health information.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Wearable devices may not be accurate, leading to incorrect temperature readings and potential misdiagnosis or improper treatment.","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of pulse oximeter sensors at non-standard locations or with inaccurate sensors can lead to false readings and misinterpretation of oxygen saturation levels.","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Introduction of wearable pulse oximeter devices","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of respiratory rate monitoring for disease evaluation","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cough and lung sound monitoring for contagious disease symptoms","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Monitoring dry cough for covid-19 detection and prevention.","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Traditional ecg monitoring systems may increase staff-to-patient contact, leading to potential cross-infections.","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cuff-based blood pressure monitoring by medical staff increases their work load and the possibility of them becoming infected.","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Obstacles exist in achieving accurate bp estimations, especially when tracking responses to medications, due to the dynamic nature and variability of bp in different individuals.","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Smartwatch data collection and heuristic model used for disease detection","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of infection through wearable technology","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to proximity of edge and fog computing to iot devices","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and training on hygiene and sanitation protocols for edge and fog Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Wearable sensors may not accurately detect airborne pathogens, leading to false sense of security.","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate privacy measures for sharing covid-19 electronic medical records cemrs could result in breaches and misuse of sensitive information.","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Medium"}]}
